mapper.select: SELECT mentoring.*, mentor_info.mentIf_ment_job as ment_mentIf_job, mentor_info.mentIf_exp as ment_mentIf_exp, mentoring_apply.mentAp_state as mentAp_state, me_nickname as ment_me_nickname FROM mentoring JOIN mentor_info ON ment_me_id = mentIf_me_id JOIN mentoring_apply ON ment_num = mentAp_ment_num JOIN `member` ON me_id = ment_me_id WHERE mentAp_me_id = #{me_id}

SELECT total_category.*, programming_category.progCt_name as toCt_progCt_name FROM total_category JOIN programming_category ON toCt_progCt_num = progCt_num WHERE toCt_table_pk = #{ment_num} and toCt_table_name = #{table}
